title: Trinidad Seeks Trump's Favor by Embracing His Caribbean Drug War
description: Trinidad and Tobago’s prime minister has backed US strikes against alleged traffickers from Venezuela, which retaliated by cutting off gas deals.
content:
On a clear day from Trinidad’s northern coast, neighboring Venezuela is visible in the distance, along with the hazy outlines of a gas platform tethered near an offshore field. Soon, the US’s largest aircraft carrier may be part of that tableau.

description: Explore the latest developments regarding Venezuela as the Trump administration considers covert actions and potential regime change.
content:
